title: Jack and the Magic Beans
desc: Explore the story of Jack, a poor boy who trades his cow for magical beans that grow into a giant beanstalk.
prompt_en: Tell me about the story of Jack and the magic beans. What happens when Jack trades his cow for the beans?
prompt_zh: 請告訴我關於傑克和魔法豆的故事。傑克把牛換成魔法豆後發生了什麼事？
sample_questions: Why did Jack sell the cow for beans?
How did Jack feel after selling the cow?
What did Jack see the next morning?
Why did Jack decide to climb the beanstalk?

title: Jack's Adventure in the Giant's Kingdom
desc: Discover Jack's journey up the beanstalk to a magical kingdom in the sky where he encounters a giant and finds treasures.
prompt_en: Describe Jack's adventure in the giant's kingdom. What treasures did he find and what dangers did he face?
prompt_zh: 描述傑克在巨人王國的冒險。他找到了哪些寶藏，遇到了哪些危險？
sample_questions: What did Jack find in the giant's kitchen?
How did Jack hide from the giant?
What treasures did Jack take from the giant's house?
How did Jack escape from the giant?
What was the giant's reaction when he discovered Jack?

title: Lessons Learned and Happy Ending
desc: Understand the lessons Jack and his mother learned after their adventures and how their lives changed.
prompt_en: What lessons did Jack and his mother learn from their experiences? How did their life change at the end?
prompt_zh: 傑克和他的母親從經歷中學到了什麼教訓？最後他們的生活有什麼改變？
sample_questions: Why did Jack's mother feel sorry?
What did Jack promise to do after his adventures?
How did Jack and his mother become rich?
What message does the story teach about greed?
How did the story of Jack end?
